SELECT qip_code_list_mat, mat_ordernum, mat_name, to_char(test_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS test_date, emp_name, test_num_mat, test_tnum_def, test_tnum_pass FROM qip_list_mat JOIN mat_order USING ( mat_dtaordcode ) JOIN com_info_emp USING ( emp_num )
AND MAT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{itemName}||'%'
AND TEST_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY qip_code_list_mat DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT qip_code_list_prod, a.indica_code, ( SELECT prod_name FROM com_code_prod WHERE prod_code = b.prod_code ) AS prod_name, a.proc_name, to_char(test_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS test_date, ( SELECT emp_name FROM com_info_emp WHERE emp_num = a.emp_num ) AS emp_name, test_num_prod, test_tnum_pass, test_tnum_def FROM qip_list_prod a JOIN mak_indica b ON ( a.indica_code = b.indica_code ) )
AND PROD_NAME LIKE '%'||#{itemName}||'%'
AND TEST_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY qip_code_list_prod DESC

SELECT qip_code_list_exp, mat_lot, mat_name, to_char(test_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS test_date, emp_name, test_num_exp as test_num_mat, test_tnum_pass, test_tnum_def FROM qip_list_expired JOIN mat_invntry USING ( mat_lot ) JOIN com_info_emp USING ( emp_num )
AND MAT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{itemName}||'%'
AND TEST_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY qip_code_list_exp DESC
SELECT * FROM qip_list_detail JOIN qip_code_test USING ( test_code ) WHERE test_detail_code = #{qipCode} ORDER BY 2
